name: XING: The Land Beyond
blurb: "Experience the wonder and unlock the mystery of XING: The Land Beyond, a first-person puzzle adventure game for the PC"

rewards.reward: No Reward
The Believer: Every little bit helps, so thank you for your donation! You will now have access to our newsletter to keep you informed on all things XING.
The Supporter: Along with the XING Newsletter subscription, you will receive a digital download the XING: The Land Beyond HD wallpaper pack.
The Adventurer: Congratulations! This gets you the full game on release, along with all previous tier rewards. Your adventure awaits in XING: The Land Beyond.

The Writer: A true bard, you will receive the digital download of the XING Runes font. Now you can study the runes before the release of the game, so perhaps you will be able to decipher some of the un-translated writings placed and hidden all over the game world. All previous reward tiers included.

The Music Lover: You get the soundtrack. Even though there are times when you will unfortunately have to leave the land of XING, you can still bring a part of it with you wherever you go. Listen to the soundtrack in the car, at work or at home, and be transported back in to that place of serenity and wonder. All previous reward tiers included.

The Friend: You are such a great friend! Not only will you be getting the game for yourself, but you will also receive a copy for your good friend. Now you can share the beauty and wonder with someone else. Add another subject to the list of mealtime discussion topics, and exchange your ideas and theories about XING: The Land Beyond. All previous reward tiers included.

The Academic: Playing the game is not enough for you. Like a true academic, you want to know everything there is to know about XING, as well as have all the character stories and poems at hand. You will therefore receive the digital downloadable PDF of all things XING. You can delve even deeper into the purpose and meaning behind the world, and perhaps even shed some light on your understanding of XING. All previous tiers included.

The True Friend: We see you are a person of many companions, so you will receive a 3rd copy of XING: The Land Beyond to do with as you wish. Surprise a friend or give it to a family member. Games make great gifts, and allow for shared experiences that can bring people together. Thank you for showing both us and your friends your true generosity. All previous reward tiers included.

The Valued Patron: We have a special place on our website for donors like you. Your name will be added to our "Special Thanks" page on the XING website for all to see. If for any reason you would rather stay anonymous, we will put up an "Anonymous Donor" place-holder for you. All previous reward tiers included.

The Pioneer: Your generous contribution affords you beta access to the game during development, as well as your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the in-game credits when the XING: The Land Beyond is released. We consider anybody this level and above to be a part of the team. All previous reward tiers included.

The Collector: Everything up to this reward tier has been digital, but you are looking for something more physical. For you, we have our Official XING: The Land Beyond custom wood USB drives. This USB is great for collectors, and you can only get one from this Kickstarter. Because it is important to us,  we have made sure that the production of the USB drive is eco-friendly. All previous reward tiers included.

The Deliverer: You will receive 2 die-cut 4" XING decals to put on your laptop, wall or car. You get one of each of our 2 decal designs, both made from quality vinyl. The first decal is the official XING logo, and the second is a symbol  you will see used frequently in the game. All previous reward tiers included.

The Veracious Gamer: You get a XING mouse pad! This is just in case you didn't have a mouse pad already, or if you don't like yours and want one that looks super cool, or are just an avid collector of mouse pads. Use this mouse pad when you are playing XING or browsing Facebook. This is a Kickstarter only item. Thank you for donating! All previous reward tiers included.

The Acute Connoisseur: Ah, excellent choice. With your contribution you will receive the 11" x 17" XING art poster, complete with signatures and personal messages from the whole team. All previous reward tiers included.

The Sharp Dresser: Clearly a donor with style. You will receive the XING: The Land Beyond T-Shirt. The logo is printed in white on the front of this Hanes, tagless T-Shirt. No big advertisements for the game or loud words, just the simple clean logo: pleasing enough for the average person to say "Gee, that's a cool design", but obscure enough to be recognized by the few adventurers who know it. All previous reward tiers included.

The Artist: After you play XING: The Land Beyond, choose your favorite character statue from the game. Let us know what it is (within the first 3 months of the game release) and you will get a paint-able miniature version of that character to have and to hold. That's right, you get a real physical miniature of any character you want. The XING miniatures are roughly 6-8 cm tall. All previous reward tiers included.

The Intrepid Explorer: What a donation! You must be a true explorer, and for that you need a bag to hold all of your items on the go. We have picked out the perfect messenger bag for you, with the official XING logo on the front. Take it to work or out hiking, and show the world how you support others. All previous reward tiers included.

The Liberator: First of all, thank you for your generous contribution. We would like to show our gratitude by offering you a similar prize to the Artist Tier, but taken a few steps further. You get to choose any statue from the game you like, and we will have our artist hand-paint a 10-15 cm version of it just for you. Your figure will come with a Certificate of Authenticity and photo authentication. All previous reward tiers included.

The Philanthropist: A visionary with means. Your charitable contribution will be helping to make XING: The Land Beyond into the best game we can make it. You understand that a passion-project such as this has expenses. To show how grateful we are, you will receive all previous tiers, as well as a custom hand-painted 11" x 14" painting on canvas board by our artist of any screenshot in XING. We are confident that with your help, by the time we are done with the game, there will be so many worthy screenshots of memorable moments and scenery for you to choose from, that your decision will be a tricky one indeed. Your painting will come signed and framed, with a personal note from each of the team members written on the back. Thank you.
